The weekend is over but all is not lost as the racing at Ayr and Kempton could help you start the new week with a bang.

Our top tipster Newboy (David Yates) has cast his eye over what's on offer at the two meetings in order to try to help you get a nice little earner to shake off those winter blues.

Have a look at his predictions and see what jumps out, but remember to gamble responsibly.
